sentences.english: The coupon is valid at ELEMENTS shop only.
sentences.chinese: 優惠劵只適用於圓方店。

sentences.english: This coupon will become invalid if defaced or damaged and is not replaceable once lost or damaged.
sentences.chinese: 本劵不設報失，逾期使用或損毀均作無效。

sentences.english: None went to work and all lived off the kids moms money and food stamps.
sentences.chinese: 他們不工作，通過啃老和食品救濟劵生活。

sentences.english: Please debit the captioned account for any costs or charges so incurred.
sentences.chinese: 請在上述證劵賬戶扣取所需費用。

sentences.english: Please accept these coupons as our Christmas gift to you.
sentences.chinese: 請收下這些贈劵作爲我們送給您的聖誕禮物。

sentences.english: Besides, Z reminded A to speed up the procedures for opening a security account for the company.
sentences.chinese: 另Z提醒A要加緊爲該公司開立證劵戶口的程序。

sentences.english: Trade on the Nasdaq stock market went uninterrupted and the impact was minimal.
sentences.chinese: 證劵交易所的交易沒有間斷，期間的損失很小。

sentences.english: Alcoholic drinks will be provided to audience of 18 or above.
sentences.chinese: 餐酒只提供予持有餐酒劵的十八歲或以上人士。

definition: (Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
group buying/collective buying/buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group
to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
